Two top medical journals on Thursday retracted a pair of influential coronavirus studies because of alleged irregularities in the underlying data.

Both journals said the firm had rebuffed requests to review its dataset https://t.co/9fN6MSRQDQ

His memorial service came less than 24 hours after additional charges were announced in the case https://t.co/xwH2yaHdph
